title: the beta
body: is there any way i can delete the beta at all makes my pc lag a lot plz help

replies.body:
Hey there,

You're still able to launch the legacy client from the new clients login screen.

However lets try and tackle your performance issues with the new client first.

In settings, you should be able to check a box to "Disable Animations", does checking this option alleviate your performance issues?
http://puu.sh/shIO6/6ed4ef1114.jpg
